Air Lock.Description: While this Pokemon is active. all weather conditions and their effects are disabled.

Arena Trap.Description: When this Pokemon enters the field. its opponents cannot switch or flee the battle unless they are part Flying-type. have the Levitate ability or they use the move Baton Pass. Levitate Pokemon cannot escape if their ability is disabled through other means. such as Skill Swap.

Battle Armor.Description: Critical Hits cannot strike this Pokemon.

Blaze.Description: When its health reaches one-third or less of its max HP. this Pokemon's Fire-type attacks receive a 50% boost in power.
Blaze.Learnt By: Blaziken. Charizard. Charmander. Charmeleon. Combusken. Cyndaquil. Quilava. Torchic. Typhlosion

Chlorophyll.Description: If this Pokemon is active while Sunny Day is in effect. its speed is temporarily doubled.
Chlorophyll.Learnt By: Bellossom. Bellsprout. Exeggcute. Exeggutor. Gloom. Hoppip. Jumpluff. Nuzleaf. Oddish. Seedot. Shiftry. Skiploom. Sunflora. Sunkern. Tangela. Tropius. Victreebel. Vileplume. Weepinbell

Clear Body.Description: Opponents cannot reduce this Pokemon's stats, they can. however. inflict stat boosts with Swagger and Flatter. This ability does not prevent self-inflicted stat reductions.
Clear Body.Learnt By: Beldum. Metagross. Metang. Regice. Regirock. Registeel. Tentacool. Tentacruel

Cloud Nine.Description: While this Pokemon is active. all weather conditions and their effects are disabled.

Color Change.Description: This Pokemon's type changes according to the type of the last move that hit this Pokemon.

Compoundeyes.Description: The accuracy of this Pokemon's moves receives a 30% increase, for example. a 75% accurate move becomes 97.5% accurate.

Cute Charm.Description: If an opponent of the opposite gender directly attacks this Pokemon. there is a 30% chance that the opponent will become Attracted to this Pokemon.
Cute Charm.Learnt By: Clefable. Clefairy. Cleffa. Delcatty. Igglybuff. Jigglypuff. Skitty. Wigglytuff

Damp.Description: While this Pokemon is active. no Pokemon on the field can use Selfdestruct or Explosion.
Damp.Learnt By: Golduck. Politoed. Poliwag. Poliwhirl. Poliwrath. Psyduck. Quagsire. Wooper

Drizzle.Description: When this Pokemon enters the battlefield. it causes a permanent Rain Dance that can only be stopped by Air Lock. Cloud Nine or another weather condition.

Drought.Description: When this Pokemon enters the battlefield. it causes a permanent Sunny Day that can only be stopped by Air Lock. Cloud Nine or another weather condition.

Early Bird.Description: This Pokemon will remain asleep for half as long as it normally would, this includes both opponent-induced sleep and user-induced sleep via Rest.
Early Bird.Learnt By: Dodrio. Doduo. Girafarig. Houndoom. Houndour. Kangaskhan. Ledian. Ledyba. Natu. Nuzleaf. Seedot. Shiftry. Xatu

Effect Spore.Description: If an opponent directly attacks this Pokemon. there is a 30% chance that the opponent will become either poisoned. paralyzed or put to sleep. There is an equal chance to inflict each status.

Flame Body.Description: If an opponent directly attacks this Pokemon. there is a 30% chance that the opponent will become burned.

Flash Fire.Description: This Pokemon is immune to all Fire-type attacks, additionally. its own Fire-type attacks receive a 50% boost if a Fire-type move hits this Pokemon. Multiple boosts do not occur if this Pokemon is hit with multiple Fire-type attacks.
Flash Fire.Learnt By: Arcanine. Flareon. Growlithe. Houndoom. Houndour. Ninetales. Ponyta. Rapidash. Vulpix

Forecast.Description: This Pokemon's type changes according to the current weather conditions: it becomes Fire-type during Sunny Day. Water-type during Rain Dance. Ice-type during Hail and remains its regular type otherwise.

Guts.Description: When this Pokemon is poisoned (including Toxic). burned. paralyzed or asleep (including self-induced Rest). its Attack stat receives a 50% boost, the burn status' Attack drop is also ignored.
Guts.Learnt By: Hariyama. Heracross. Larvitar. Machamp. Machoke. Machop. Makuhita. Raticate. Rattata. Swellow. Taillow. Tyrogue. Ursaring

Huge Power.Description: This Pokemon's Attack stat is doubled. Therefore. if this Pokemon's Attack stat on the status screen is 200. it effectively has an Attack stat of 400, this stat is then subject to the full range of stat boosts and reductions.

Hustle.Description: This Pokemon's Attack receives a 50% boost but its Physical attacks receive a 20% drop in Accuracy. For example. a 100% accurate move would become an 80% accurate move. The accuracy of moves that never miss. such as Aerial Ace. remains unaffected.

Hyper Cutter.Description: Opponents cannot reduce this Pokemon's Attack stat, they can. however. inflict a stat boost with Swagger. This ability does not prevent self-inflicted stat reductions.
Hyper Cutter.Learnt By: Corphish. Crawdaunt. Gligar. Kingler. Krabby. Mawile. Pinsir. Trapinch

Illuminate.Description: When this Pokemon is in the first slot of the player's party. it doubles the rate of wild encounters.

Immunity.Description: This Pokemon cannot become poisoned nor Toxic poisoned.

Inner Focus.Description: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.
Inner Focus.Learnt By: Abra. Alakazam. Crobat. Dragonite. Farfetch'd. Girafarig. Glalie. Golbat. Kadabra. Sneasel. Snorunt. Zubat

Insomnia.Description: This Pokemon cannot be put to sleep, this includes both opponent-induced sleep as well as user-induced sleep via Rest.
Insomnia.Learnt By: Ariados. Banette. Drowzee. Hoothoot. Hypno. Murkrow. Noctowl. Shuppet. Spinarak

Intimidate.Description: When this Pokemon enters the field. the Attack stat of each of its opponents lowers by one stage.
Intimidate.Learnt By: Arbok. Arcanine. Ekans. Granbull. Growlithe. Gyarados. Hitmontop. Masquerain. Mawile. Mightyena. Salamence. Snubbull. Stantler. Tauros

Keen Eye.Description: This Pokemon's Accuracy cannot be lowered.
Keen Eye.Learnt By: Farfetch'd. Fearow. Furret. Hitmonchan. Hoothoot. Noctowl. Pelipper. Pidgeot. Pidgeotto. Pidgey. Sableye. Sentret. Skarmory. Sneasel. Spearow. Wingull

Levitate.Description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type attacks. Spikes and the Arena Trap ability, it loses these immunities after using Ingrain.
Levitate.Learnt By: Baltoy. Chimecho. Claydol. Duskull. Flygon. Gastly. Gengar. Haunter. Koffing. Latias. Latios. Lunatone. Misdreavus. Solrock. Unown. Vibrava. Weezing

Lightning Rod.Description: During double battles. this Pokemon draws any single-target Electric-type attack to itself. If an opponent uses an Electric-type attack that affects multiple Pokemon. those targets will be hit. This ability does not affect Electric Hidden Power.
Lightning Rod.Learnt By: Cubone. Electrike. Manectric. Marowak. Rhydon. Rhyhorn

Liquid Ooze.Description: When another Pokemon uses Absorb. Dream Eater. Giga Drain. Leech Life. Leech Seed or Mega Drain against this Pokemon. the attacking Pokemon loses the amount of health that it would have gained.

Magnet Pull.Description: When this Pokemon enters the field. Steel-type opponents cannot switch out nor flee the battle unless they use the attack Baton Pass.

Marvel Scale.Description: When this Pokemon becomes burned. poisoned (including Toxic). paralyzed. frozen or put to sleep (including self-induced sleep via Rest). its Defense receives a 50% boost.

Minus.Description: This Pokemon's Special Attack receives a 50% boost in double battles if its partner has the Plus ability.

Natural Cure.Description: When this Pokemon switches out of battle. it is cured of poison (including Toxic). paralysis. burn. freeze and sleep (including self-induced Rest).
Natural Cure.Learnt By: Altaria. Blissey. Celebi. Chansey. Corsola. Roselia. Starmie. Staryu. Swablu

Oblivious.Description: This Pokemon cannot become attracted to another Pokemon.
Oblivious.Learnt By: Barboach. Illumise. Jynx. Lickitung. Numel. Piloswine. Slowbro. Slowking. Slowpoke. Smoochum. Swinub. Wailmer. Wailord. Whiscash

Overgrow.Description: When its health reaches one-third or less of its max HP. this Pokemon's Grass-type attacks receive a 50% boost in power.
Overgrow.Learnt By: Bayleef. Bulbasaur. Chikorita. Grovyle. Ivysaur. Meganium. Sceptile. Treecko. Venusaur

Own Tempo.Learnt By: Grumpig. Lickitung. Slowbro. Slowking. Slowpoke. Smeargle. Spinda. Spoink

Pickup.Description: If it is not already holding an item. this Pokemon may find and be holding a variety of items after a battle: see the full Pickup List for more information.
Pickup.Learnt By: Aipom. Linoone. Meowth. Phanpy. Teddiursa. Zigzagoon

Plus.Description: This Pokemon's Special Attack receives a 50% boost in double battles if its partner has the Minus ability.

Poison Point.Description: If an opponent directly attacks this Pokemon. there is a 30% chance that the opponent will become poisoned.
Poison Point.Learnt By: Nidoking. Nidoqueen. Nidoran F. Nidoran M. Nidorina. Nidorino. Qwilfish. Roselia. Seadra

Pressure.Description: When an opponent uses a move that affects this Pokemon. an additional PP is required for the opponent to use that move.
Pressure.Learnt By: Absol. Aerodactyl. Articuno. Deoxys. Deoxys (Attack). Deoxys (Defense). Deoxys (Speed). Dusclops. Entei. Ho-oh. Lugia. Mewtwo. Moltres. Raikou. Suicune. Zapdos

Pure Power.Description: This Pokemon's Attack stat is doubled. Therefore. if this Pokemon's Attack stat on the status screen is 200. it effectively has an Attack stat of 400, this stat is then subject to the full range of stat boosts and reductions.

Rain Dish.Description: If active while Rain Dance is in effect. this Pokemon recovers one-sixteenth of its max HP after each turn.

Rock Head.Description: This Pokemon does not receive recoil damage unless it uses Struggle or it misses with Jump Kick or Hi Jump Kick.
Rock Head.Learnt By: Aerodactyl. Aggron. Aron. Bagon. Cubone. Geodude. Golem. Graveler. Lairon. Marowak. Onix. Relicanth. Rhydon. Rhyhorn. Shelgon. Steelix. Sudowoodo

Rough Skin.Description: When this Pokemon is directly attacked. the opponent receives damage equal to 1/8 of its max HP.

Run Away.Description: Unless this Pokemon is under the effects of a trapping move or ability. such as Mean Look or Shadow Tag. it will escape from wild Pokemon battles without fail.
Run Away.Learnt By: Aipom. Dodrio. Doduo. Dunsparce. Eevee. Furret. Ponyta. Poochyena. Rapidash. Raticate. Rattata. Sentret. Snubbull

Sand Stream.Description: When this Pokemon enters the battlefield. it causes a permanent Sandstorm that can only be stopped by Air Lock. Cloud Nine or another weather condition.

Sand Veil.Description: If active while Sandstorm is in effect. this Pokemon's Evasion receives a 20% boost, if this Pokemon has a typing that would normally take damage from Sandstorm. this Pokemon is also immune to Sandstorm's damage.
Sand Veil.Learnt By: Cacnea. Cacturne. Diglett. Dugtrio. Gligar. Sandshrew. Sandslash

Serene Grace.Description: The side effects of this Pokemon's attack occur twice as often. For example. if this Pokemon uses Ice Beam. it will have a 20% chance to freeze its target.
Serene Grace.Learnt By: Blissey. Chansey. Dunsparce. Jirachi. Togepi. Togetic

Shadow Tag.Description: When this Pokemon enters the field. its opponents cannot switch or flee the battle unless they use the move Baton Pass.

Shed Skin.Description: After each turn. this Pokemon has a 33% chance to heal itself from poison (including Toxic). paralysis. burn. freeze or sleep (including self-induced Rest).
Shed Skin.Learnt By: Arbok. Cascoon. Dragonair. Dratini. Ekans. Kakuna. Metapod. Pupitar. Seviper. Silcoon

Shell Armor.Description: Critical Hits cannot strike this Pokemon.
Shell Armor.Learnt By: Clamperl. Cloyster. Corphish. Crawdaunt. Kingler. Krabby. Lapras. Omanyte. Omastar. Shellder

Shield Dust.Description: If the opponent uses a move that has secondary effects that affect this Pokemon in addition to damage. the move's secondary effects will not trigger. (For example. an Ice Beam will lose its 10% chance to freeze this Pokemon.)

Soundproof.Description: This Pokemon is immune to the effects of the sound-related moves Grasswhistle. Growl. Heal Bell. Hyper Voice. Metal Sound. Perish Song. Sing. Sonicboom. Supersonic. Screech. Snore and Uproar.
Soundproof.Learnt By: Electrode. Exploud. Loudred. Mr. Mime. Voltorb. Whismur

Speed Boost.Description: While this Pokemon is active. its Speed increased by one stage at the end of every turn, the six stage maximum for stat boosts is still in effect.

Static.Description: If an opponent directly attacks this Pokemon. there is a 30% chance that the opponent will become paralyzed.
Static.Learnt By: Ampharos. Electabuzz. Electrike. Electrode. Elekid. Flaaffy. Manectric. Mareep. Pichu. Pikachu. Raichu. Voltorb

Stench.Description: When this Pokemon is in the first slot of the player's party. it halves the rate of wild encounters.

Sticky Hold.Description: Opponents cannot remove items from this Pokemon.

Sturdy.Description: The one-hit KO moves Fissure. Guillotine. Horn Drill and Sheer Cold do not affect this Pokemon.
Sturdy.Learnt By: Aggron. Aron. Donphan. Forretress. Geodude. Golem. Graveler. Lairon. Magnemite. Magneton. Nosepass. Onix. Pineco. Shuckle. Skarmory. Steelix. Sudowoodo

Suction Cups.Description: Roar and Whirlwind do not affect this Pokemon.

Swarm.Description: When its health reaches one-third or less of its max HP. this Pokemon's Bug-type attacks receive a 50% boost in power.
Swarm.Learnt By: Ariados. Beautifly. Beedrill. Heracross. Ledian. Ledyba. Scizor. Scyther. Spinarak. Volbeat

Swift Swim.Description: If this Pokemon is active while Rain Dance is in effect. its speed is temporarily doubled.
Swift Swim.Learnt By: Feebas. Goldeen. Gorebyss. Horsea. Huntail. Kabuto. Kabutops. Kingdra. Lombre. Lotad. Ludicolo. Luvdisc. Magikarp. Mantine. Omanyte. Omastar. Qwilfish. Relicanth. Seaking. Surskit

Synchronize.Description: If an opponent burns. poisons or paralyzes this Pokemon. the same condition inflicts the opponent.
Synchronize.Learnt By: Abra. Alakazam. Espeon. Gardevoir. Kadabra. Kirlia. Mew. Natu. Ralts. Umbreon. Xatu

Thick Fat.Description: This Pokemon receives halved damage from Ice-type and Fire-type attacks.
Thick Fat.Learnt By: Azumarill. Azurill. Dewgong. Grumpig. Hariyama. Makuhita. Marill. Miltank. Sealeo. Seel. Snorlax. Spheal. Spoink. Walrein

Torrent.Description: When its health reaches one-third or less of its max HP. this Pokemon's Water-type attacks receive a 50% boost in power.
Torrent.Learnt By: Blastoise. Croconaw. Feraligatr. Marshtomp. Mudkip. Squirtle. Swampert. Totodile. Wartortle

Trace.Description: When this Pokemon enters the field. it temporarily copies an opponent's ability. This ability remains with this Pokemon until it leaves the field.

Truant.Description: After this Pokemon is switched into battle. it skips every other turn.

Vital Spirit.Description: This Pokemon cannot be put to sleep, this includes both opponent-induced sleep as well as user-induced sleep via Rest.

Volt Absorb.Description: When an Electric-type attack hits this Pokemon. it recovers health equal to the damage that it would have taken, this Pokemon can recover up to 25% of its max HP in this way.

Water Absorb.Description: When a Water-type attack hits this Pokemon. it recovers health equal to the damage that it would have taken, this Pokemon can recover up to 25% of its max HP in this way.
Water Absorb.Learnt By: Lapras. Mantine. Politoed. Poliwag. Poliwhirl. Poliwrath. Quagsire. Vaporeon. Wooper

White Smoke.Description: Opponents cannot reduce this Pokemon's stats, they can. however. inflict stat boosts with Swagger and Flatter. This ability does not prevent self-inflicted stat reductions.

Wonder Guard.Description: This Pokemon only receives damage from attacks belonging to types that cause Super Effective to this Pokemon. Wonder Guard does not protect a Pokemon from status ailments (burn. freeze. paralysis. poison. sleep. Toxic or any of their side effects or damage). recoil damage nor the moves Beat Up. Bide. Doom Desire. Future Sight. Hail. Leech Seed. Sandstorm. Spikes and Struggle. Wonder Guard cannot be Skill Swapped nor Role Played. Trace. however. does copy Wonder Guard.
